name: gryphon-mount
description: Core Software for Gryphon Mount Games
author: Denny S. Temple (https://dentemple.com/)

scripts.build: npm run bootstrap && lerna run --stream build
scripts.start: npm run build && lerna run --parallel --no-bail start
scripts.audit:fix: npm audit fix && lerna run --stream --no-bail audit:fix && npm run bootstrap
scripts.deps:update: ncu -u && npm i && lerna run --stream --no-bail deps:update && npm run bootstrap
